font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Each Building has created and will maintain Google Classrooms which students will see links to videos and other helpful materials. Our posts will be aimed at mental health and wellness, as well as disseminating important information to students in upper grades.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Counselors will be accessible by email and phone for certain hours throughout the day.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Counselors will be checking in with individual students who have been high needs throughout the school year.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Community Mental Health resources will be compiled in a list and shared with both students and parents through various forms of communication.

h2.style: color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif

span.style: text-decoration: underline
font-size: 18pt

div.style: color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif
color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif
color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif
color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif

div.div: For those families who do not have their own computers or other devices that will allow for remote learning:

div.style: color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif

span.style: color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif

strong.style: color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif

span.style: color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif

strong.style: color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif

span.style: color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif

div.span: , chromebooks for remote learning will be distributed for all students in the District, Grades K - 12.

div.style: color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif
color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif

div.div: The distribution sites will be at the child's school building and will be delivered to you by a staff member at curbside. Please remain in your vehicles during this distribution. We ask that parents and guardians be patient during this process as we are looking out for the safety of everyone involved.

div.style: color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif
color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif

div.div: The student will receive a chromebook and charger. We will provide a release form which contains information about appropriate care of the device as it will need to be returned to school once school resumes its regular schedule.

div.style: color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif
color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif

div.div: We will have more information about the District's educational plan for your child by the end of the week. Please look for future updates and check the District website periodically.

span.style: text-decoration: underline
font-size: 18pt

div.style: color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif

div.div: For parents, guardians, or students that are having problems with their school-issued Chromebook:

div.style: color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif
color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif

div.div: The Technology Office has created an email for those that need technology support. You can send your help requests directly to mcsremotesupport@mcs.mojohelpdesk.com. Some examples related to this support would be as follows -

div.style: color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif

li.style: color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif
color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif
color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif

ul.li: Problems connecting to Google Classroom or other education-based applications

li.style: color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif
color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif

ul.li: Problems with being unable to power on or off the Chromebook

div.style: color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif
color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif

div.div: If you are unable to contact the Technology Office via mcsremotesupport@mcs.mojohelpdesk.com, please contact us via phone at the following -

div.style: color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif
color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif
color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif
color: #212121; font-size: 15px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Segoe WP', 'Segoe UI WPC', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif

h2.style: margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #212121; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #212121; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px

div.p:
For those students who want to pick up their personal belongings and musical instruments, we will be providing an opportunity for curbside pickup on Friday, March 20, 2020, from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM at each school. Given the large number of students we wish to accommodate, it would be appreciated if your requests were limited to the most essential items necessary for your student's education and welfare.
Elementary Schools – Pickup Procedure
To expedite this process, please send an email ahead of time to the building secretary of your child’s school. Email addresses are provided below. In your email, include the following information:
• Student’s Name
• Name of Student’s Classroom Teacher
• Personal Items Requested
• Musical Instrument Requested
• Location of Items Requested
• Approximate time of pickup
• Chromebook – This will be an opportunity to pick up a Chromebook if you require one and have not already done so.
Contacts:
Jefferson Elementary School – Denice Votra – dvotra@mcs.k12.ny.us
Madison Elementary School – Debbie Rush – drush@mcs.k12.ny.us
Nightengale Elementary School – Ally McLean – amclean@mcs.k12.ny.us
Note: When you arrive at the school, please remain in your vehicle, as a staff member will deliver your items to you curbside. We ask that parents and guardians be patient during this process as we are looking out for the safety of everyone involved.
Junior High and High School – Pickup Procedure
To expedite this process, please send an email ahead of time to the person noted below at your child’s school. In your email, include the following information:
• Student’s Name
• Personal Items Requested
• Educational Items Requested (i.e. calculator, books, etc.)
• Musical Instrument Requested
• Location of Items Requested
• Approximate time of pickup
• Chromebook – This will be an opportunity to pick up a Chromebook if you require one and have not already done so.

div.p: Junior High School - Chrissie Curran - ccurran@mcs.k12.ny.us

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #212121; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px

margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #212121; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px

br.strong: Note: When you arrive at the school, please remain in your vehicle, as a staff member will deliver your items to you curbside. We ask that parents and guardians be patient during this process as we are looking out for the safety of everyone involved.

br.br: Thank you for your cooperation as we deal with the extraordinary circumstances in which we find ourselves. The community has come together to support our faculty, staff and students. We are extremely grateful for the spirit of goodwill exhibited by parents and organizations.

object.title: Massena.SFSP.flyer (3)
object.p: It appears you don't have a PDF plugin for this browser. Please download the PDF file.

div.style: width: 250px;

div.div: We aspire to be a leading educational community that values diversity and prepares students to meet today’s goals and tomorrow’s opportunities.
